titles.title: To block any action from being taken to finalize or give effect to a certain proposed rule governing the Federal child support enforcement program.
To block any action from being taken to finalize or give effect to a certain proposed rule governing the Federal child support enforcement program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: This bill prohibits the Department of Health and Human Services from taking any action to finalize, implement, enforce, or otherwise give effect to the proposed rule entitled "Flexibility, Efficiency, and Modernization in Child Support Enforcement Programs" or any proposal set forth in the proposed rule.
